meanings.sent1: The unhyphenated word was easy to read.
meanings.sent2: The book had many unhyphenated words.
meanings.sent3: I prefer unhyphenated words in my writing.
meanings.sent4: Her unhyphenated name stood out on the list.
meanings.sent5: The unhyphenated text was clear and concise.
